p: Fig 3 and S1 Fig show the current distributions of PWN [ 57] and PWD [ 29, 30, 35– 39, 58, 59] and the regions currently vulnerable to PWD. Within the natural Pinus distribution area, the southern parts of North America, Europe, and Asia were categorized as vulnerable regions (MB ≥ 22), while in Asia, large parts of the Pinus distribution area were categorized as vulnerable. Representative provinces in which PWD has been reported at least once [ 29, 30, 35– 39, 58, 59] overlapped with the regions categorized as vulnerable to PWD ( Fig 4).
